name: super-trading-platform
description: DAIN Super Trading Platform - Unified autonomous trading with AI agents

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n gateway,orchestrator,frontend,cloddsbot,agent-dex -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:cloddsbot" "npm run dev:agent-dex"
